Uses of Package
edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query

Packages that use edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query
edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query Implements a Jackrabbit query handler using XTF and other query handling classes. 
 

Classes in edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query used by edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query
AbstractQueryHits
          AbstractQueryHits serves as a base class for QueryHits implementations.
AbstractQueryImpl
          AbstractQueryImpl provides a base class for executable queries based on SearchIndex.
MultiColumnQueryHits
          MultiColumnQueryHits defines an interface for reading tuples of ScoreNodes.
NamespaceMappings
          The class NamespaceMappings holds a namespace mapping that is used internally in the search index.
QueryHits
          Defines an interface for reading ScoreNodes
ScoreNode
          ScoreNode implements a simple container which holds a mapping of full path to a score value.
ScoreNodeIterator
          Extends the NodeIterator interface by adding a ScoreNodeIterator.getScore() method that returns the score for the node that is returned by NodeIterator.nextNode().
SearchIndex
          Implements a Jackrabbit query handler using Fedora.
XTFQuery
          XTFQuery processes the query, stores the filter conditions and temporary results on a step by step basis.
